name: Population & Infrastructure
desc: The basic infrastructure required to support a given population, from rickety orbital hab-modules to megacities and everything between.

name: robotic worker assembely
desc: A facility producing utility drones. Provides a small amount of population growth to an AI-Pop market

name: robot worker factory
desc: A large facility designed to produce utility drones en masse. Provides a boost to population growth divided between all friendly AI-Pop worlds in the system.

name: robot worker production center
desc: A massive production facility designed to produce immense amounts of utility drones. Provides a large amount of population growth divided between all same faction AI-Pop markets in the sector.

name: AI Node Production Facility
desc: A facility that produces command cores and command nodes, critical components used to control a robotic colony. Also adds a command node trainer were you may create command nodes of varying quality.

name: Robotic Maintenance Center
desc: A facility that produces maintenance parts for robotic workers and possesses additional repair facilities for the most severe of synthetic injuries.

name: Synthetic Production Center
desc: A rigorous process of producing a skin-like substance, layered over a robot frame with a mix of mock - and real - organs installed. Almost 90% of robotic drones created from this factory fail to meet the required criteria and are recycled.

name: Automated Ship Instalation Center
desc: a building that allows ships to be upgraded with a free -perament- AI Retrofit hullmod. removes any other AI Retrofit hullmod when the upgrade is compleat. even ones that are otherwize permintly instaled

name: Salavage Robot Manufactory
desc: A massive factory that produces salvage drones on a industrial scale.

name: Survey Robot Manufactory
desc: A massive factory that produces survey drones on a industrial scale.

name: Combat Robot Manufactory
desc: A massive factory that produces combat drones on a industrial scale.

name: Population Replacement Center
desc: Replace the colony's human population with robot drones, or its robotic population with human colonists. Removes itself upon completion.

name: for building a thing for a thing please dont ask it was someone else
